title: Lassen Volcanic National Park: Photo Gallery
body: Photo Galleries       Lassen Volcanic National Park is in the process of moving its image galleries to Flickr. You may browse our Flickr site for images or view photos in the galleries listed below. Hiking Trails Photo Galleries Galleries include Brokeoff Mountain, Bumpass Hell, Cold Boiling and Crumbaugh Lakes, Crags Lake, Devil's Kitchen, Kings Creek Falls, Lassen Peak, Manzanita Lake, Mill Creek Falls, Mt. Harkness, Paradise Meadow, Ridge Lakes, Terrace, Shadow, and Cliff Lakes Natural Features Photo Galleries Galleries include lakes, waterfalls, and hydrothermal areas. You can also view hydrothermal features on Flickr. Lassen Wildflowers
